top_stories.title: X restricts Grok’s image generation to paying subscribers only after drawing the world’s ire
top_stories.description: Elon Musk's AI company has restricted Grok's controversial AI image-generation feature to only paying subscribers on X, after the tool invited heated criticism from across the world for letting users generate sexualized images of women and children.
top_stories.author: Ram Iyer
top_stories.content: Elon Musk's AI company has restricted Grok's controversial AI image-generation feature to only paying subscribers on X, after the tool invited heated criticism from across the world for letting users generate sexualized images of women and children.

top_stories.title: Upwind Announced the Launch of Choppy AI
top_stories.description: New AI-native capabilities enable intuitive exploration, rule creation, and investigation, grounded in real cloud context and designed for trust and control Upwind, the leading runtime-first cloud security platform, announced today the general availability of Choppy AI, embedding new AI-powered capabilities across the company’s CNAPP platform. Choppy AI introduces natural-language–driven experiences... The post Upwind Announced the Launch of Choppy AI first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: NVIDIA DRIVE AV Software Debuts in All-New Mercedes-Benz CLA
top_stories.description: NVIDIA is enabling a new era of AI-defined driving, bringing its NVIDIA DRIVE AV software with enhanced level 2 point-to-point driver assistance capabilities to U.S. roads, expected by end of this year — starting with Mercedes-Benz, a long-standing partner in advancing safe, intelligent mobility. The all-new Mercedes-Benz CLA — the brand’s first vehicle featuring the Read Article

top_stories.title: Speed meets scale: Load testing SageMakerAI endpoints with Observe.AI’s testing tool
top_stories.description: Observe.ai developed the One Load Audit Framework (OLAF), which integrates with SageMaker to identify bottlenecks and performance issues in ML services, offering latency and throughput measurements under both static and dynamic data loads. In this blog post, you will learn how to use the OLAF utility to test and validate your SageMaker endpoint.
top_stories.author: Aashraya Sachdeva
top_stories.content: Observe.ai developed the One Load Audit Framework (OLAF), which integrates with SageMaker to identify bottlenecks and performance issues in ML services, offering latency and throughput measurements under both static and dynamic data loads. In this blog post, you will learn how to use the OLAF utility to test and validate your SageMaker endpoint.

top_stories.title: How Beekeeper optimized user personalization with Amazon Bedrock
top_stories.description: Beekeeper’s automated leaderboard approach and human feedback loop system for dynamic LLM and prompt pair selection addresses the key challenges organizations face in navigating the rapidly evolving landscape of language models.
top_stories.author: Mike Koźmiński
top_stories.content: Beekeeper’s automated leaderboard approach and human feedback loop system for dynamic LLM and prompt pair selection addresses the key challenges organizations face in navigating the rapidly evolving landscape of language models.
